tads3.restartGameRunnerOnT3ImageChanges.description: Restarts the t3 game image in the interpreter whenever it is recompiled.

tads3.gameRunnerInterpreter.description:
Runs the game in an command line interpreter if the setting tads3.restartGameRunnerOnT3ImageChanges is enabled. 
(Note: If on windows "t3run.exe -plain" can be used if the regular tads3 workbench is installed.)

tads3.maxNumberOfParseWorkerThreads.description: Set the maximum number of worker threads that takes care of the parsing. An optimal number depends on the hardware.

tads3.parseOnlyTheWorkspaceFiles.description: In case working on a slower machine and parsing the library takes way too long time to complete, this option is here to turn off the parsing of library files and only concentrate on the workspace files. (Requires a restart after change.)

tads3.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

tads3.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

tads3.enablePreprocessorCodeLens.description: Shows preprocessed rows above as CodeLens when they differ from original source code.

tads3.ifArchiveExtensionURL.description: Path the ifarchive directory for tads3 contributions
